column2: "Yo! I'm the ARKS trainee, Rupert! Please help me, Professor!"
"You and the other ARKS fight Darkers every day, don't you! Would you teach me about Dagan today?!"
"I'd like to watch on the monitor how you attack the Dagan's core and land the killing blow like last time!"
"Alright, I'm really looking forward to it!"
